Detail - Seal design to be reviewed prior to sealing.

○ Approval to commence will not be given until evidence of a valid certificate of compliance with BCA E/2 (1992 Provisional), together with approved operating instructions for each particular distributor to be used in the work, is supplied to the CPS Engineer.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Review
Conformance Criteria - The Contractor shall ensure that all materials comply with TNZ M/1: 2011, M/06S and M/06C: 2011 (and Napier addendum) and M/13: 1995.
Detail - Determine Bearing strength of Sub Grade
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Testing

Detail - Site Engineer and CPS Engineer to undertake a Proof Roll test on the trimmed subgrade prior to Sub base placement
Frequency - Prior to Sub Base Construction

Detail - All aggregate loads coming to site to have delivery dockets checked to ensure material is coming from the correct stockpile. Site Engineer to keep a running tally of material delivered to site and docket number
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Measurement and recording
Conformance Criteria - Comply with TNZ M/3 Specification.
Records - Delivery Dockets, Aggregate Deliveries Register
Detail - Material is spread from truck & trailers and any contamination is removed or loads are to be rejected if material is non compliant
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Detail - Carry out a Level Check on the trimmed Sub base
Frequency - 1/100m if machine control is used or 1/20m if no machine control
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Measurement
Records - QA measurement Sheet, CS-4100a Subbase Approval
○ The subbase shall be constructed in two layers.
○ Lower subbase results must be approved before construction of upper layer.
Frequency - Maximum of 20m intervals, with test locations at each interval are to be varied across the new pavement area.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - NDM Testing
Conformance Criteria - Avg. >= 95% MDD and Min. >= 92% MDD

Frequency - 1/100m if machine control is used or 1/20m if no machine control

Records - QA measurement Sheet, CS-4100b Basecourse Approval

Conformance Criteria - Avg. >= 98% MDD and Min. >= 95% MDD

Conformance Criteria - No point of the surface shall vary more than 10mm over a 3m long straight edge

Conformance Criteria - The large and small aggregates are held in place and the matrix does not displace under normal trafficking or sweeping

Conformance Criteria - Ensure sufficient passes with roller to embed chip (typically 4-5 passes)

Frequency - At the completion of the Lot of work
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual
Detail - The final walkover must be scheduled at least one week before the site's completion or demobilisation.

Detail - Red pen mark-up drawings are to be included in the QA file.

Conformance Criteria - All RFI, NCRs and site changes must be recorded.
Detail - Redline mark-up drawings are to be reviewed and accepted by CPS.

Conformance Criteria - Ensure all QA is uploaded into ConQA / Procore
